law.catch_line: Suspension or revocation of, or refusal to issue or renew, license.
law.history: Amended 2012 Ky. Acts ch. 76, sec. 18, effective July 12, 2012. -- Repealed, reenacted, renumbered, and amended 2002 Ky. Acts ch. 280, sec. 9, effective April 9, 2002. -- Amended 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 74, Art. V, sec. 24(2). -- Created 1966 Ky. Acts ch. 63, sec. 10.

metadata.lrc-note: (7/15/2002). The Reviser of Statutes has renumbered the subsections of this section under the authority of KRS 7.136.
